taxon_name.authority: de Candolle in A. P. de Candolle and A. L. P. P. de Candolle

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family asteraceae;tribe astereae;genus solidago;section solidago;subsection triplinerviae;species lepida;subspecies lepida

bio:treatment.description: Distal cauline leaves: margins with 0â€“6 teeth per side. Phyllaries (also peduncles, peduncle bracts and/or distalmost leaves) sparsely to moder-ately, minutely stipitate-glandular.
bio:treatment.discussion: Subspecies lepida is divided into two varieties that can be difficult to distinguish.
